title: Ticket #623: When editing wiki attachments are broken
description:
When editing wiki pages, clicking the "attach" link to attach such things as images returns an internal server error page.

However, clicking attach on a ticket seems to work just fine.

In particular see DeveloperTechnicalOverview. I have images I'm trying to attach.
remarks:
2009-Jul-14 13:59:46 by tannenba:
Fixed. There was a bug in attach.c introduced in #48.
creator: alderman
